channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 美国议员敦促大众汽车退出新疆业务
item.description: The chair of a U.S. House Committee on China and the top Democrat on the panel urged Volkswagen to halt operations in Xinjiang after thousands of vehicles with a small Chinese-made electronic component were held at U.S. ports.翻译:美国众议院中国问题委员会主席和该委员会的民主党高层敦促大众汽车停止在新疆的业务，此前数千辆装有中国制造的小型电子元件的汽车被扣押在美国港口。
item.author: David Shepardson

item.title: 乌克兰战争已过去两年，全球贸易裂痕扩大
item.description: Two years after Russia's invasion of Ukraine, there are clear signs that the global economy is fragmenting into two separate blocs and that multilateral trade rules that have underpinned commerce for nearly 30 years are under threat.翻译:俄罗斯入侵乌克兰两年后，有明显迹象表明全球经济正在分裂成两个独立的集团，近 30 年来支撑商业的多边贸易规则正受到威胁。
item.author: Philip Blenkinsop

item.title: 海德堡材料考虑在美国上市以解决估值差距
item.description: Heidelberg Materials is weighing a listing in the United States as a way to potentially tackle a geographical gap in valuation, its chief executive told analysts on Thursday.翻译:海德堡材料公司首席执行官周四对分析师表示，该公司正在考虑在美国上市，以此作为潜在解决估值地域差距的一种方式。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国电动卡车初创公司Windrose首席执行官表示探索在欧洲生产
item.description: Chinese electric heavy truck start-up Windrose plans to outsource manufacturing of its vehicles to automaking partners in Europe, its founder and CEO said on Thursday, as it seeks to take on rivals Tesla and Mercedes Benz in the region.翻译:中国电动重型卡车初创公司Windrose的创始人兼首席执行官周四表示，该公司计划将其车辆的制造外包给欧洲的汽车制造合作伙伴，以寻求在该地区与特斯拉和梅赛德斯奔驰的竞争对手展开竞争。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国要求国际法院就以色列“非法”占领发表言论
item.description: China asked the International Court of Justice (ICJ) on Thursday to give its opinion on Israel's occupation of the Palestinian Territories, which it said was illegal.翻译:中国周四要求国际法院就以色列占领巴勒斯坦领土发表意见，称以色列占领巴勒斯坦领土是非法的。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官表示，已开始为中国市场提供两款新的人工智能芯片样品
item.description: Nvidia is currently offering customers samples of its two new artificial intelligence chips aimed at the China market, its CEO Jensen Huang said, in a bid to defend its market dominance in the country now threatened by U.S. export curbs.翻译:英伟达首席执行官黄仁勋表示，英伟达目前正在向客户提供两款针对中国市场的新型人工智能芯片样品，以捍卫其在目前受到美国出口限制威胁的中国市场主导地位。
item.author: Stephen Nellis, Yelin Mo

item.title: 早盘竞价：人工智能“临界点”推动英伟达、纳斯达克、日经指数走高
item.description: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 梅赛德斯首席执行官警告欧盟不要针对中国采取保护主义
item.description: Any move by the European Union to increase protectionism against China would be a destructive move for an economic region like Europe, Mercedes-Benz CEO Ola Kaellenius said on Thursday after the carmaker published its quarterly results.翻译:梅赛德斯-奔驰首席执行官奥拉·卡林纽斯(Ola Kaellenius)周四在汽车制造商公布季度业绩后表示，欧盟针对中国加强保护主义的任何举措，对于欧洲等经济地区来说都是毁灭性的举动。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国将向美国派遣更多大熊猫 开启“熊猫外交”新时代
item.description: China's Wildlife Conservation Association is working with the National Zoo in Washington in an arrangement that could bring more pandas back to the United States, signalling improving diplomatic relations between the two superpowers.翻译:中国野生动物保护协会正在与华盛顿国家动物园合作，安排将更多大熊猫带回美国，这标志着两个超级大国之间的外交关系正在改善。
item.author: Eduardo Baptista, Bernard Orr

item.title: 臭气熏天的塞尔维亚废水加剧了环境问题
item.description: Next to a block of new high-rises in Belgrade's upscale Waterfront neighbourhood, a foul-smelling stream spews sewage directly into the Sava River, one of scores of outlets polluting the city's waters.翻译:在贝尔格莱德高档滨水区的一栋新建高层建筑旁边，一条恶臭的溪流将污水直接排入萨瓦河，萨瓦河是污染该市水域的数十个排水口之一。
item.author: Aleksandar Vasovic

item.title: 中国科考船在印度洋作业
item.description: China's scientific survey fleet of ships is growing and although the government insists the vessels are for research purposes only, some Asian neighbours, especially India, are concerned sensitive data they gather might be shared with the Chinese military.翻译:中国的科学调查船队正在不断壮大，尽管政府坚称这些船只仅用于研究目的，但一些亚洲邻国，尤其是印度，担心他们收集的敏感数据可能会与中国军方分享。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国商飞在新加坡航展上抢走了空客和波音的风头
item.description: Chinese state-owned planemaker COMAC upstaged industry leaders Airbus and Boeing at the Singapore Airshow this week, showing off its self-developed C919 and ARJ21 jets as it pursues international certifications and foreign orders.翻译:中国国有飞机制造商中国商飞公司本周在新加坡航展上抢走了行业领头羊空客和波音公司的风头，展示了其自主研发的C919和ARJ21喷气式飞机，同时寻求国际认证和外国订单。
item.author: Brenda Goh, Lisa Barrington

item.title: 法国食品集团达能对 2023 年的强劲表现充满信心
item.description: French food group Danone on Thursday said it was confident for the year ahead after sales growth last year at the top end of its forecast, as higher prices improved its profit margin, offsetting lower volumes.翻译:法国食品集团达能周四表示，继去年销售增长达到预期上限后，公司对未来一年充满信心，因为价格上涨提高了利润率，抵消了销量下降的影响。
item.author: Dominique Vidalon

item.title: 中国联想营收在连续五个季度下滑后实现增长
item.description: China's Lenovo Group , the world's largest maker of personal computers (PCs), reported stronger-than-expected earnings on Thursday, with revenue returning to growth after five quarters of decline amid a post-COVID-19 slowdown.翻译:全球最大的个人电脑 (PC) 制造商中国联想集团周四公布了强于预期的收益，其收入在经历了 5 个季度的下滑后恢复增长，并因新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 疫情之后经济放缓而出现下滑。
item.author: Josh Ye

item.title: 中国面临更大的压力，要求采取重大政策来修复经济
item.description: As the annual meeting of China's parliament approaches next month, its leaders are facing the greatest pressure in almost a decade to take bold policy decisions that safeguard the economy's long-term growth potential.翻译:随着下个月中国人大年度会议的临近，中国领导人面临着近十年来最大的压力，需要做出大胆的政策决定，以保障经济的长期增长潜力。
item.author: Joe Cash, Ellen Zhang, Liangping Gao

item.title: 早盘竞价：英伟达帮助日经指数冲过终点线
item.description: A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland翻译:凯文·巴克兰 (Kevin Buckland) 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国小鹏汽车与阿联酋 Ali&Sons 签署合作伙伴关系，瞄准意大利市场
item.description: China's Xpeng on Thursday said it has established a strategic partnership with UAE-based Ali&Sons and added Italy to its Europe plans, as the electric vehicle maker ramps up overseas expansion.翻译:中国小鹏汽车周四表示，随着这家电动汽车制造商加大海外扩张力度，它已与总部位于阿联酋的 Ali&Sons 建立了战略合作伙伴关系，并将意大利纳入其欧洲计划。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 广州附近驳船撞桥致车辆落水致五人死亡
item.description: Five people were killed after a barge collided with a bridge over a waterway in China's Pearl River Delta near Guangzhou city, causing part of the bridge to break off, plunging vehicles into the water, Chinese state media reported on Thursday.翻译:据中国官方媒体周四报道，一艘驳船与广州市附近中国珠江三角洲水道上的一座桥梁相撞，导致桥梁部分断裂，车辆落入水中，造成五人死亡。
item.author: Liz Lee, Bernard Orr

item.title: 左撇子：Zara 在快时尚领域对抗 Shein 的秘密武器
item.description: Zara owner Inditex , the world's biggest listed fast fashion company by sales, is expanding its low-priced Gen Z-focused brand Lefties to counter Chinese-founded rival Shein.翻译:Zara 母公司 Inditex 是全球销量最大的快时尚上市公司，该公司正在扩大其专注于 Z 世代的低价品牌 Lefties，以对抗中国创立的竞争对手 Shein。
item.author: Corina Pons, Helen Reid

item.title: 中国调查船访问马尔代夫可能引发印度洋安全担忧
item.description: A Chinese research ship arrived in the Maldives on Thursday, global ship-tracking data showed, just three months after a similar vessel visited the Indian Ocean and sparked New Delhi's security concerns.翻译:全球船舶跟踪数据显示，一艘中国科考船于周四抵达马尔代夫，而就在三个月前，一艘类似的船只访问了印度洋并引发了新德里的安全担忧。
item.author: Ryan Woo
